title: 40’ Enclosed Trailer with Contents
item_description:
40’ Enclosed Trailer with Contents

Trailer Details

  • VIN #: 164224
  • License: UJ2793
    • Expiration Date: 12/31/2006
  • Trailer Type: Enclosed

Dimensions

  • Overall Length: 480”
  • Overall Width: 96”
  • Overall Height: 134”
  • Deck Length: 480”
  • Deck Width: 96”
  • Side Height: 93”

Axles, Brakes, and Tires

  • Number of Axles: 2
  • Brake Type: Air
  • Electric Plug Type: 7-Way Round
  • Hitch: 5th Wheel

Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of removal of this lot. No loading assistance or assistance of any kind will be provided by West Auctions. Please bid accordingly.

Note: Application for Replacement Title, and Transfer Form will be mailed 2-3 weeks following the removal. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of the inspections, transfer, registration, taxes, and fees due to DMV.
